name: AMUSEMENT FUNFAIR PARK
description: Who does not like the amusement park? Enjoy the fascinating experience! You can endlessly use everything without queuing! From the dodgem to the pirate ship you can find everything here! Explore the city's teeming, walk into the city center while trying out everything you find. Go close to the machines and press the on button to get on and push  the off button to get off.
